I did some debug, it is caused in addFilterToAdapterWithAdapterFilePath() where adapter file path does not exist.
This problem is fixed.  Had to consider the parser namespace when searching for the adpater file.  Could the owner reassign this bug to me so that I can close it.
Reassigning to Sheldon to fix in 4.3 i2
